    Search by phrase

    Search by phrase

    search_by_phrase.Rmd

    With gitstats you can look for the activity connected to a certain phrase.

    library(gitstats)
library(magrittr)
git_stats <- create_gitstats() %>%
  set_connection(
    api_url = "https://api.github.com",
    token = Sys.getenv("GITHUB_PAT"),
    orgs = c("pharmaverse")
  ) %>%
  set_connection(
    api_url = "https://gitlab.com/api/v4",
    token = Sys.getenv("GITLAB_PAT"),
    orgs = c("erasmusmc-public-health", "doctorworld")
  )
#> ✔ Set connection to GitHub.
#> ✔ Set connection to GitLab.

get_repos(git_stats,
          by = "phrase",
          phrase = "covid",
          language = "R") %>% 
  plot_repos()
#> → [GitHub] Pulling repositories by phrase...
#> ✔ On GitHub ('pharmaverse') found 2 repositories.
#> → [GitLab] Pulling repositories by phrase...
#> ✔ On GitLab ('erasmusmc-public-health') found 1 repositories.
#> ✔ On GitLab ('doctorworld') found 1 repositories.
#> Rows: 4
#> Columns: 12
#> $ organisation     <chr> "pharmaverse", "pharmaverse", "care-app-public", "era…
#> $ name             <chr> "admiral", "sdtmchecks", "Flutter Widget From Html", …
#> $ created_at       <dttm> 2021-03-18, 2022-09-15, 2022-09-08, 2020-06-29
#> $ last_activity_at <drtn> 1.33 days, 4.33 days, 182.33 days, 685.33 days
#> $ forks            <chr> "35", "1", "", ""
#> $ stars            <int> 133, 13, 0, 0
#> $ contributors     <chr> "https://api.github.com/repos/pharmaverse/admiral/co…
#> $ issues           <chr> "https://api.github.com/repos/pharmaverse/admiral/is…
#> $ issues_open      <chr> "", "", "", ""
#> $ issues_closed    <chr> "", "", "", ""
#> $ description      <chr> "ADaM in R Asset Library", "Analysis facing checks fo…
